summary: $FLOPPY - In a distant galaxy, a Character made by Matt Furie named Floppy became lost in space during a solo journey. After days of drifting, when glimpsing at a radiant planet called ETH. The inhabitants took floppy in, offering shelter and friendship. Floppy shared tales of the space travels and embraced the vibrant world of ETHEREUM. Lost in space, Floppy found a new home and community, living happily among the kind-hearted residents of ETH.
